name: 郭美純
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week 1: Orientation & Get to know the class
Week 2: Unit 1 Family Matters
Week 3: Unit 1 Family Matters & Unit 2 Coffee and Your Health
Week 4: Unit 2 Coffee and Your Health & Unit 3 The Animal Kingdom
Week 5: Unit 3 The Animal Kingdom & Unit 4 Basketball Fever
Week 6: Unit 4 Basketball Fever 
Week 7: Review Unit 1-4 
Week 8: TED Talk
Week 9: Mid Term Examination (unit 1-4)
Week 10: Unit 5 Caring for the Environment 
Week 11: Unit 5 Caring for the Environment & Unit 6 Table Manners
Week 12: Unit 6 Table Manners & Unit 7
Week 13: Unit 7 Finding the World's Best with Michelin
Week 14: Unit 8 Music is In Our Soul
Week 15: Unit 8 Music is In Our Soul 
Week 16: Review unit 5-6-7-8
Week 17: TED Talk (or movie appreciation)
Week 18: Final Examination (unit 5-8)
scorePolicy:
期中會考 15%
期末會考 15%
班上期中報告 15%
班上期末考 15%
其他 （小考，作業，出席率，上課參與）40%
